segments.text: I can’t believe how careless that woman is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn’t even seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and fix this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman wakes up and realizes what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
